text:
"The race to find a vaccine is not a competition between countries, but the most urgent shared endeavour of our lifetimes. We're in this together, and together we will prevail." 

– PM @BorisJohnson calls on countries to come together to defeat coronavirus. https://t.co/vNJ0ctyRpz

entity.name: Coronavirus Tweets from UK authorities
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the Prime Minister, First Ministers, NHS and public health authorities across the UK. For more, visit www.nhs.uk/coronavirus
